unnormalised: ## Bollywood Blunders and Biryani Bellyaches: Your Weekly Dose of Desi Gossip!
normalised: ## Bollywood Blunders and Biryani Bellyaches: Your Weekly Dose of Desi Gossip!

unnormalised: Namaste, gossip gurus! Buckle up buttercups, because this week's tea is hotter than a plate of Maa's vindaloo.
normalised: Namaste, gossip gurus! Buckle up buttercups, because this week's tea is hotter than a plate of Maa's vindaloo.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt like dust devils in Rajasthan! Apparently, sources (reliable sources, you know, the kind that only exist in my imagination) spotted Ranbir at Bandra's trendy Pali Hill Cafe *without* Alia. GASP! And get this – he was allegedly sketching in a notebook. Is he finally penning that script he's been promising us since *Rockstar*? Or, more likely, doodling Alia's name inside a heart. Either way, drama, people, drama!
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt like dust devils in Rajasthan! Apparently, sources (reliable sources, you know, the kind that only exist in my imagination) spotted Ranbir at Bandra's trendy Pali Hill Cafe *without* Alia. GASP! And get this – he was allegedly sketching in a notebook. Is he finally penning that script he's been promising us since *Rockstar*? Or, more likely, doodling Alia's name inside a heart. Either way, drama, people, drama!

unnormalised: Then there's the case of Deepika Padukone’s mysteriously missing Onam Sadhya. Last week, she posted a cryptic Insta story about craving the festive feast, only to delete it 2 hours later. Did Ranveer hoard all the payasam? Did she accidentally order 100kgs of thoran instead of 1? The nation wants to know, Deepika! The nation *needs* to know!
normalised: Then there's the case of Deepika Padukone’s mysteriously missing Onam Sadhya. Last week, she posted a cryptic Insta story about craving the festive feast, only to delete it two hours later. Did Ranveer hoard all the payasam? Did she accidentally order one hundred kilograms of thoran instead of one? The nation wants to know, Deepika! The nation *needs* to know!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, our favorite perpetually-late actor, Shah Rukh Khan (bless his punctual soul), was reportedly delayed by 30 minutes for a charity event in Delhi. Sources say he got stuck in traffic near India Gate. Honestly, with Delhi traffic, I'm surprised it wasn't 3 hours. At least he probably had some amazing butter chicken to compensate for the stress.
normalised: Meanwhile, our favorite perpetually-late actor, Shah Rukh Khan (bless his punctual soul), was reportedly delayed by thirty minutes for a charity event in Delhi. Sources say he got stuck in traffic near India Gate. Honestly, with Delhi traffic, I'm surprised it wasn't three hours. At least he probably had some amazing butter chicken to compensate for the stress.

unnormalised: And lastly, shocking news from the world of TV serials! Apparently, a major catfight erupted on the set of *Sasural Simar Ka 3*. Apparently, the bahus were arguing over who got the last piece of jalebi. Jalebi-gate, folks! I predict this will become a national issue.
normalised: And lastly, shocking news from the world of T V serials! Apparently, a major catfight erupted on the set of *Sasural Simar Ka three*. Apparently, the bahus were arguing over who got the last piece of jalebi. Jalebi-gate, folks! I predict this will become a national issue.

unnormalised: That's all for this week, folks! Remember to take all this with a generous pinch of namak and enjoy responsibly. Until next time, keep your eyes peeled and your chai brewing!
